description: Algolia gathers clicks/conversation data that is used to track click/conversion evnets.  It will also unlock Algolia AI features. This field group is a standard field group that can be used to map to these events.

queryID.description: The Query ID is a random sequence of letters and numbers that uniquely identifies a search request. Algolia uses the query ID to connect a search or browse request to a click or conversion event.
queryID.title: Query ID

quantity.description: The Quantity of the purchased or added-to-cart item.
quantity.title: Quantity

price.description: The final price of the item, inclusive of any discounts in effect.
price.title: Price

discount.description: The Discount is an absolute value, measured in currency.
discount.title: Discount

objectData.description: The Object Data property allows admins to add additional data that is in the same index in the Object ID's array.
objectData.title: Object Data

queryID.description: The Query ID is a random sequence of letters and numbers that uniquely identifies a search request. Algolia uses the query ID to connect a search or browse request to a click or conversion event.
queryID.title: Query ID

positions.description: The Positions of the clicked objects in the search results. This property is required for click events with queryID. The first search result has a position of 1 (not 0).
positions.title: Positions

indexName.description: The Index Name that contains the item.
indexName.title: Index Name

objectIDs.description: The Object IDs is a list of items from a specified Algolia index.
objectIDs.title: Object IDs

eventSubtype.description: The Event Subtype is a specific conversion event.
eventSubtype.title: Event Subtype

eventName.description: The Event Name is a user specified event.
eventName.title: Event Name

userToken.description: User tokens are strings that uniquely identify users throughout your app.
userToken.title: User Token

currencyCode.description: The Currency Code is ISO-4217 currency code, such as USD or EUR. It is required when pricing is included.
currencyCode.title: Currency Code

authenticatedUserToken.description: The Authenticated User Token is pseudonymous identifier for authenticated users.
authenticatedUserToken.title: Authenticated User Token
